jobDescription: Sabot Consulting has an immediate need for a Business, Data, and/or Performance Analyst to support a key client implement solutions to ensure compliance with the Affordable Care Act. You will work with a team of professionals to plan and execute business, system, and stakeholder change.  Mandatory Qualifications Strong skills in performing data analysis using Excel functions and Access queriesProven ability to translate data analysis into summarized executive reports and graphsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsExpert knowledge of Medicaid claims data Desirable Qualifications Experience working in a customer centric environment (e.g., consulting, vendor)Expert knowledge of Medi-Cal claimsExperience performing outreach and communication to external stakeholdersBachelor Degree in Business, IT, or MISSDL2017
